SEARCH
Package org.example.model

Class Model

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.Model
public class Model extends Object
Class in which the Model is properly set up to start the match.

  • Method Details

    • DealCards

      public void DealCards()
      This method iterates over the `PlayersList` (since iterating directly over a HashMap is not feasible). It draws cards from various decks and assigns them to each player. It then sends a notification to each player with their initial hand and objectives using the `notifyModelSpecific` method.

    • showArea

      public void showArea()
      Shows the visible area.

    • showPublicObjective

      Shows the public objectives.

    • notifyModelChange

      public void notifyModelChange(String username, String specificMessage, String generalMessage) throws RemoteException
      Called when something changes in the Model from the methods like Draw and Play.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      specificMessage - the specific message for the player
      generalMessage - the general message for all players
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • notifyModelSpecific

      public void notifyModelSpecific(String username, String specificMessage) throws RemoteException
      Notifies a specific player about a model change.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      specificMessage - the specific message for the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • notifyModelGeneric
